metadata.title: CVE-2023-2460 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient validation of untrusted input in Extensions in Google Chromeprior to 113.0.5672.63 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to installa malicious extension to bypass file access checks via a crafted HTML page.(Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
